sentence.Network_en: Theoretically, the price is supposed to be marked on the shelf.
sentence.Network_cn: 照理说，价格应该标在货架上。

sentence.Network_en: Emigration was still theoretically a matter of choice.
sentence.Network_cn: 从理论上讲，移民仍是个个人选择的问题。

sentence.Network_en: It's theoretically possible, but highly unlikely ever to happen.
sentence.Network_cn: 这从理论上说是有可能的, 但是基本上不会发生.

entry.def: You use theoretically to say that although something is supposed to be true or to happen in the way stated, it may not in fact be true or happen in that way.

example.ex: Theoretically, the price is supposed to be marked on the shelf...
example.tran: 照理说，价格应该标在货架上。

example.ex: Emigration was still theoretically a matter of choice.
example.tran: 从理论上讲，移民仍是个个人选择的问题。

auth_sentence.content: Today, at least theoretically, it has standing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Today, at least theoretically, it has standing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Today, at least theoretically, it has standing.

auth_sentence.content: Michael Schumacher would theoretically have done the same thing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Michael Schumacher would theoretically have done the same thing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Michael Schumacher would theoretically have done the same thing.

auth_sentence.content: Theoretically we could access to others memories as well.
auth_sentence.res_content: Theoretically we could access to others memories as well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Theoretically we could access to others memories as well.

sentences.en: Theoretically, a line can extend into infinity.
sentences.cn: 从理论上来说直线可以无限地延伸。

sentences.en: It’s theoretically possible, but highly unlikely ever to happen.
sentences.cn: 这从理论上说是有可能的，但是基本上不会发生。
